instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure: Use .js extension for all React components. Use Shadcn components from /components/ui but customize their styles via className props according to the guidelines.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or simple useState for MVP state. No Redux unless necessary.
instructions_to_main_agent.routing: Use react-router-dom v6+. Ensure protected routes for Admin/User roles.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS exclusively. Avoid inline styles.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all form inputs have associated labels. Use semantic HTML.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
